platforms.name: Abstra.Space
platforms.description: Platform for displaying three-dimensional spaces on the web with navigation through subspaces and spatially aware AI.

features.title: 3D Space Display
features.description: Showcase three-dimensional environments with immersive web-based visualization.

features.title: Subspace Navigation
features.description: Navigate seamlessly through different areas and rooms within virtual spaces.

features.title: Spatially Aware AI
features.description: AI assistant that understands your location and route to provide contextual information.

features.title: Contextual Intelligence
features.description: Get detailed information about any space element based on your current position and path.

platforms.name: GoldenPapers.ai
platforms.description: AI-powered research assistant for academic and scientific literature.

features.title: Smart Literature Review
features.description: Automatically analyze and summarizing relevant research papers.

features.title: Citation Generator
features.description: Generate properly formatted citations in any academic style.

features.title: Research Insights
features.description: Discover connections between papers and identify research gaps.

features.title: Collaborative Annotations
features.description: Share and discuss research findings with colleagues.

platforms.name: Pran√© Virtual Band
platforms.description: Create music collaboratively with AI-powered virtual musicians.

features.title: AI Musicians
features.description: Collaborate with AI-powered virtual musicians across different instruments.

features.title: Style Adaptation
features.description: Generate music in any genre or blend multiple styles together.

features.title: Live Performance
features.description: Create real-time music performances with AI accompaniment.

features.title: Music Production
features.description: Export studio-quality tracks for sharing or professional use.

platforms.name: Dot Science Club
platforms.description: Your gateway to the Hermes ecosystem with unified access and exclusive community benefits.

features.title: Unified Authentication
features.description: Single sign-on access to all Hermes Dot Science platforms and services.

features.title: Community Access
features.description: Connect with innovators, researchers, and creators in our tech community.

features.title: Event Benefits
features.description: Free access and exclusive discounts to technology conferences and workshops.

features.title: Innovation Hub
features.description: Early access to new features, beta programs, and collaborative projects.
